title: I Will Just Beat The Shit Out of You (Part 1)
body:
I Will Just Beat The Shit Out of You (Part 1)

The atmosphere inside the base of the dark guild was dead silent. The mouths of Sebastian and others were opening and closing like goldfish, they wanted to say something but no words came out of their mouths.

They felt like their brain capacity was not enough to process the event that just happened.

The eyes of Sebastian and others darted between Evan and Amanda feeling like they just witnessed domestic violence.

Amanda was lying on the ground with a bloodied mouth, some of her teeth were missing and her brain was also trying to process the event that just happened.

Suddenly a murderous aura started to cover the surroundings along with sharp sword intent.

Amanda's brain finally processed the odd event that just happened and now she was fuming with anger.

Sebastian and others also came out of their shock after feeling the sharp sword intent along with the murderous aura.
